Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2014 10:26PM 3doglady wrote: Because Im BRCA1 positive, it is a natural choice for me to have chosen PBMX With no reconstruction.  Just had my surgery August 8.  I will be working again this weekend.  For peace of mind, I wanted this surgery.  I started with a lumpectomy in December.  I have been afraid of my breasts since then.  Went through chemo, was node negative, and with PBMX, no rads.  Im sore, and since I was large breasted, feel a significant void of cushion.  But pleased.  I can wear a prosthetic, I dont have to wear anything.  recovery has been better without reconstruction.  Dont know if this helps, but, it might.
Posts.Title: reconsidering mastectomy after surgery and radiation have2laugh have2laugh
